p:
An empty glass beaker was oven dried at 105°C for 1 hr, cooled in a desiccator, and weighed ( W 1). 2 g of the sample ( W 2) was weighed into the beaker, and both beaker and its content were oven dried at 105°C and cooled in a desiccator until constant weight was obtained ( W 3). The percentage moisture was calculated as:
Moisture
( % )
=
W 2
‐
W 3
W 2
‐
W 1
× 100 .
